title: Tales of the Taira Clan = Shin heiki monogatari
creator_contributor_role: Daiei Motion Picture Company, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Japan - Rural conditions
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Japan
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
description: Set in twelfth-century Japan against a rich social and political background, this is an epic tale of power struggles, family drama, and human frailty. Mizoguchi lavished everything - sumptuous colour, elaborate sets and costumes - on this gripping drama, making his penultimate film - only one of two films he made in colour - a masterpiece. In Japanese with English subtitles.
